org.michailov.async.io

Class AsyncByteStreamWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.michailov.async.AsyncAgent
      • org.michailov.async.io.AsyncByteStreamWriter

  • public class AsyncByteStreamWriter
extends AsyncAgent
    Asynchronous byte writer over a plain old OutputStream.

    The stream bytes are read from a ByteRingBuffer.

    Note: The caller is responsible for opening and closing the stream as needed.

    See Also:
    WhenReady, AsyncAgent, ByteRingBuffer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncByteStreamWriter(java.io.OutputStream outputStream, ByteRingBuffer byteRingBuffer, AsyncOptions asyncOptions)
      Constructs a new AsyncByteStreamWriter instance to write to the given OutputStream from the given ByteRingBuffer.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      "action" function that reads bytes from the ring buffer and writes them to the stream.
      protected boolean done()
      The 'done' predicate passed to WhenReady.startApplyLoopAsync(java.util.function.Predicate<S>, java.util.function.Predicate<S>, java.util.function.Function<S, R>, S).
      ByteRingBuffer getByteRingBuffer()
      Returns the attached ring buffer where bytes will be read from.
      java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
      Returns the underlying OutputStream.
      boolean isEOF()
      Checks whether this writer has reached EOF of the byte ring buffer.
      protected boolean ready()
      "ready" predicate that returns true when bytes can be read from the ring buffer without blocking.

        public AsyncByteStreamWriter(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                             ByteRingBuffer byteRingBuffer,
                             AsyncOptions asyncOptions)
        Constructs a new AsyncByteStreamWriter instance to write to the given OutputStream from the given ByteRingBuffer.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - An OutputStream to write to.
        byteRingBuffer - A ByteRingBuffer to read from.
        asyncOptions - AsyncOptions that will control all async operations on this instance.

      • isEOF

        public boolean isEOF()
        Checks whether this writer has reached EOF of the byte ring buffer.
        Returns:
        true iff EOF has been reached or an exception has been encountered.

      • ready

        protected boolean ready()
        "ready" predicate that returns true when bytes can be read from the ring buffer without blocking.

        Notice that OutputStream, unlike InputStream, has no way to report how many bytes can be written without blocking.

        Overrides:
        ready in class AsyncAgent
        Returns:
        Derived classes should override this method to return true iff it is time to execute AsyncAgent.action().

      • done

        protected boolean done()
        Description copied from class: AsyncAgent
        The 'done' predicate passed to WhenReady.startApplyLoopAsync(java.util.function.Predicate<S>, java.util.function.Predicate<S>, java.util.function.Function<S, R>, S).
        Overrides:
        done in class AsyncAgent
        Returns:
        Derived classes should override this method to return true iff it is time for the loop to stop.

      • action

        protected void action()
        "action" function that reads bytes from the ring buffer and writes them to the stream.
        Overrides:
        action in class AsyncAgent
